title: Interpretation of a dream about praying in the rain according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of praying in the rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream of prayer is one of the dreams that many people dream about in a dream, as it has many different interpretations and connotations, the most important of which is that it is one of the dreams that indicate goodness and plenty of sustenance, as long as there are no traces or Evidence of destruction or devastation due to rain, and since seeing prayer in the rain in a dream is an indication of an answered prayer or confirmation of the fulfillment of goals and desires, of course rain in real life indicates goodness, nourishment, and pleasant skin, as it happens in a dream, and through our article this is what we will learn about in Dreaming about the interpretation of rain prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin and all the interpretations and signs related to it. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the rain in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Praying in the rain in a dream has many connotations, and seeing rain is often a praiseworthy vision, as it may carry some hidden events in the dream. Our dreams in their pockets a lot of goodness and satisfaction. Food for insight. Below are the sirens: If one sees in a dream that rain is falling and he stands under it and wants to pray, this means that God Almighty will provide him with a lot of goodness and abundance, and in the case of increased rain, we indicate that God Almighty wills. It provides him with sustenance in ways that do not matter in his real life. If a person sees in a dream that the sky is raining money on him, this is an indication that the dreamer will be exposed to a major financial crisis, and this vision is a sign from God Almighty that help will come and distress and anguish will come. Remove them from as soon as possible. Ibn Sirin attributes the presence of cunning to the dreamer’s life in general, but this shows Interpretation of a dream about praying in the rain in a dream by Ibn Sirinak Food, money, goodness, and blessings that God will enjoy. In the event that one sees in a dream the presence of rain, this indicates the removal of worries And the problems that the dreamer is exposed to. If a person sees in a dream that he is praying and the sky is pouring abundant water, this indicates that God Almighty will respond to the prayer of that person who sees it. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Paradise in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of praying in the rain for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream Begging is one of the interpretations that many people search for, as this vision is one of the visions that brings a lot of joy and happiness to the dreamer himself, because begging during the rain is one of the answered prayers. The interpretation in a dream of begging in the rain for a married woman is as follows: Seeing deception in a dream concerns a married woman, and her begging represents all that is good for her. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is begging and pleading with God Almighty, this means that this woman will bear a male child. If a married woman dreams that she is praying in the rain, this indicates that the doors to her livelihood have been opened. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Paradise in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams about praying in the rain for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees rain in a dream in general, this indicates the arrival of good news. And happy for that girl

title: Interpretation of seeing an ugly man in a dream

preview.html: Seeing any ugliness in a dream is associated with luck and happiness and can appear in many different ways. You may see an ugly face, people mutilating an ugly animal, or you may see your face become ugly.. Here is the interpretation of seeing an ugly man in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an ugly man in a dream Seeing an ugly person in a dream reflects the dreamer's inner state, so an ugly person can symbolize all the bad feelings and forbidden desires of the seeker. The dream of an ugly man shows a fortune teller who suffers from anxiety about many things for no reason. He fears that his plans will not come true, that help will not come in time, and he does not see future prospects. The dream of moving away from an ugly person in a dream with feelings of disgust reflects the dreamer's lack of understanding of the meaning of existence and his uncertainty about his abilities. If you dream that an ugly person scares you in a dream, this means that you are afraid of your future, often showing weakness and negative traits. If you meet an ugly person at a meeting without feeling negative emotions in a dream and are ready to help, this dream indicates that you will get rid of your fears, and if this dream appears after an unhappy period in your life, it may be considered a sign of better times. If you dream of a sudden meeting with an ugly person, this means that you will earn money. Seeing that you are fighting with an ugly person means that you are going through a good period of happiness and improvement in your life. Seeing that you are beating an ugly person means that you will experience unexpected health. If you see in your dream that you are killing an ugly person, this means that you expect good luck. Seeing an ugly man in a dream means that you may face some problems, but you may be very sensitive to possible fears in the future. Interpretation Seeing an ugly man in a dream Interpretation of seeing oneself ugly in a dream If you see yourself ugly in a dream, this dream portends beauty. If you dream that you see your ugly appearance in the mirror, or dream that you meet ugly people, this means that you will have disagreements on the social and business level. If you see your face ugly in a dream, this means that you should try to change your outlook on life. Seeing ugly faces in a dream generally means that there will be some difficulties in the future. Seeing oneself ugly in a dream may mean that he is obsessed with focusing on his appearance. Seeing yourself ugly in a dream means misfortune in love despite others enjoying the physical appearance. Seeing an ugly person in a dream means that he may face some difficulties with his life partner. Interpretation of seeing an ugly woman in a dream If you see an ugly woman in your dreams, you may have to deal with some upcoming disagreements. If you are a woman and you see yourself ugly, this means that you will not care about your partner, which will lead to separation. If a person sees a dream about an ugly woman, he should be prepared for competition and jealousy in love affairs. Seeing a woman Ugly in a dream means that others will turn to you for advice. Interpretation of seeing a face that changes its ugliness in a dream Seeing your face turn into an ugly face in a dream means that there may be here

title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking Coca-Cola

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Coca-Cola in a man’s dream When a man dreams of drinking Coca-Cola during his sleep, this is a sign that he is a social person and is loved by others. It also shows that he has a lot of skill to convince and change his mind about everything. Interpretation of seeing Coca-Cola in a man’s dream A woman who dreams of drinking Coca-Cola or Pepsi A lot in a dream indicates that he will be exposed to a crisis Great health, due to her interest in enjoying the world more than the afterlife. It also indicates a woman’s bad reputation. Perhaps it indicates missing the opportunity to marry the dreamer due to multiple relationships with men. The meaning of seeing Coca-Cola in a dream Coca-Cola in a dream means success. It indicates in a man’s dream the duties assumed. He is important in an organization as a result of his endeavors. Through his closeness to leaders and officials. As for a person who suffers from problems and crises and sees Coca-Cola in a dream, it is a good omen for the end of these worries. It may indicate hearing good news after a period of anguish and sadness. Interpretation of Coca-Cola and refraining from drinking it When a person dreams that he sees Coke in his dream And he avoids drinking it, this means that he thinks a lot about the problems he is going through. It shows his inability to solve these problems. It may indicate family problems that will end after a short time. But if he drinks it in a dream, and stops thinking about crises and adversity, this is evidence that there are no more problems and he feels comfortable. After being tired. Interpretation of seeing Elephanta in a dream: Whoever dreams of Elephanta in a dream, this is a sign of the beginning of a new project and good news about its success and the collection of donations from it. It also indicates that the dreamer will succeed in his work within a short period and become an important person in society and move in life with abundance and luxury. Drinking Elephanta in a dream indicates The dreamer will perform many good deeds that will positively affect his work and personal life and change for the better. It also indicates the fortuneteller’s excessive effort in achieving and applying systems and laws in his work that will enable him to succeed and collect money to achieve what he wants in his life. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, with reference to Marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Horse in a dream handsome Youssef

preview.html: What are the interpretations of seeing a horse in a dream, Waseem Youssef? What does it mean for a single woman to see a white horse in a dream? What is the importance of seeing a ride or carriage for a single woman? What is the interpretation of seeing a white horse for a married woman? What does it mean to see a horse giving birth in a dream? What does running away from a horse in a dream mean for a married woman? All these questions that confuse us, we will provide their answers in detail through the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing horses in a dream Waseem Youssef for a single woman: We find that seeing a white horse for an unmarried woman in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness, optimism, and happiness, as it indicates an answer to prayer. Watching the purchase of a horse, Or even seeing a gift with a horse in a dream, indicates goodness and the arrival of livelihood, if this horse is beautiful and healthy, and riding a horse indicates the arrival of fame. And when an unmarried girl sees a horse with a person on it in a dream, this means that she will get engaged or get married soon. Whereas If a girl sees that she is riding a white mare and going up or down a hill, and she always looks back and sees a man riding a black horse and chasing her, this indicates that she will succeed, but this success is added to sadness. And he has enemies. Riding in a dream for a single woman: Interpretation of riding by Ibn Sirin: Whoever dreams that he is riding a horse indicates that he is working to serve a righteous man. And whoever is seen riding a horse with wings indicates that he will obtain a great king. And whoever sees that he rode a horse in his dream and then ran with it. Show the disobedience he seeks. Whoever is seen drinking from the milk of imagination indicates that he will be influenced by something better than the Sultan. Whoever sees himself riding a horse indicates that he will gain pride, honor, and status. Seeing a water horse indicates a person who is lying. And when an unmarried girl sees that she She rides a horse, this indicates that she will marry a wealthy, righteous man. The meaning of riding a horse in a dream: When a person sees himself riding a horse without a saddle or a bridle, it means that he married a woman who is not infallible, even if the color of the horse is gray, that is, she is religious. When a person sees himself in a dream riding A horse, it means that he will gain fame, money and honor among men and it may indicate travel. If a man dreams that he is riding a gray horse, this means that he will get married if he is not married. While seeing Adham riding a horse in a dream, it indicates a trip in which his money will be less. And when He sees a horse riding on its iron legs, this indicates that he will die. But if a person sees that he is riding a dead horse, this indicates that he will be affected by sadness and distress. And if he sees himself getting off and riding another horse, this indicates that the topic will change to another topic and he is likely to get married again. Other. Riding a carriage in a dream for a single woman: If a girl dreams that she is riding a black carriage with a friend next to her, this indicates that she will be interested in many famous and important men in society. And when one sees that he is riding a carriage and walking with her on the water, this indicates that he will have Great wealth and living a luxurious life, but if the water is turbulent or has fog, this indicates that this

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Rahman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Rahman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin's interpretation, Surat Al-Rahman is one of the blessed surahs in which many verses and evidence of the existence of God Almighty are mentioned, in which God denies lying, ignorance and arrogance of the infidels with the verses of God and the signs of His presence around them everywhere. The dream is considered one of the most common surahs that indicate that the dreamer will receive many blessings in the Qiblah stage of his life. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Rahman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin's interpretation. Interpretation of a dream of seeing Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will open the doors of kindness for him. Also, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will close all the doors of evil in front of him. When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be given a long life. Also, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will achieve the righteousness of his religion. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Rahman Ibn Sirin's interpretation When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Rahman in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be blessed with many blessings in this world's life. Also, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Rahman in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will receive the mercy of God Almighty in the afterlife. When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Rahman or having it read to him in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will move to the Two Holy Mosques as is the case with the dreamer. Dream. He sees that he is reciting Surat Al-Rahman or that it is being read to him in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will move to Alexandria. When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Rahman in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will memorize the Holy Quran. Also, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Rahman in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will understand him in religion. Also, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surah Ar-Rahman in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will not be able to harm his enemies. Also, when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surah Ar-Rahman in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will receive the blessings of the world. title: What you do not know about the interpretation of feces in a dream and its repercussions according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of feces in a dream? Seeing feces is one of the visions that make many people feel anxious and panicked, as it is known that it is a disgusting thing for humans and not preferable, and in this article we will learn about the best. Interpretation of feces in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin saw that seeing feces In a dream, it indicates many things that differ between good and evil, and in many cases it can be a good vision. Collecting feces in a dream. If the dreamer sees that he is collecting it and putting it in a bag or bowl, then this is one of the good dreams for him, which indicates happiness and peace of mind, and evidence To profit in trade, obtain a high and good position. A job or anything that the dreamer wants to achieve. And if he sees that he collects them, then stores them somewhere, this is evidence that he is of good reputation, and that his heart is good, and it is also evidence of quality and perfection. In his art. But if the dreamer sees that he is sitting on top of him, this indicates that he will obtain a lot of money, and it may be his inheritance, but he did not know. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google. And get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about animal waste. If he finds feces in his dream, and they belong to one of the animals, this is a sign that he will get a lot of money in the future. Seeing oneself defecating in a dream is one of the things that indicates good health, especially if the dreamer is suffering Of some diseases, it is a cure for his illness and his health after illness, and God is Most High and He knows best. When children’s feces are seen, this is evidence of a lot of goodness and nourishment, especially if the infant is a girl. Interpretation of feces in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. For those who see that it is feces from Al-Nabulsi’s point of view, for him, it is a sign of goodness, good condition, and obtaining great joy. I dreamed that I have a bowel movement, and whoever sees that he is defecating in his dream, this is evidence that he will be exposed to some problems in his life, but they will go away, God willing, in the form of the vision, and if defecation is easy, the solution to the problem is easy. If he sees him in his clothes or defecating in them, this is evidence that he is a wasteful person. He should avoid it. Sources: - 1- The Book of Selected Words in the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar Al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000. 2- The Dictionary of the Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi. Al Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008. 3- The Book of Perfumes of Dreams as an Expression of a Dream, Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi.

If the dreamer sees that he is collecting it and putting it in a bag or bowl, then this is one of the good dreams for him, which indicates happiness and peace of mind, and evidence To profit in trade, obtain a high and good position. A job or anything that the dreamer wants to achieve. In his art. But if the dreamer sees that he is sitting on top of him, this indicates that he will obtain a lot of money, and it may be his inheritance, but he did not know. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pants in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing pants in a dream by Ibn Sirin, as it is known that pants are one of the clothes that are important to many people, whether men or women, and they come in many types, shapes and colors, and there is no doubt that seeing them in a dream contains many interpretations, as they differ from Some of them are based on the condition of the dreamer, and in this article we learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of seeing pants in a dream.Interpretation of the dream of seeing pants in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The researcher Ibn Sirin presented many interpretations and interpretations of the dream in which the vision of pants comes, as this vision contains many of these The various interpretations, and in this context we learn about them. The interpretation of the dream of seeing pants in a dream by Ibn Sirin is explained as follows: It is worth noting that seeing pants in a dream, in the words of the scholar Ibn Sirin, is evidence of marrying an orphan. In addition, buying pants in A dream for unmarried or unmarried women. It is evidence of the livelihood that comes to the dreamer, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing black pants in a dream has bad meanings. As it indicates distress, bad character and religion. While seeing white pants in a dream is a sign of halal food from the source, it indicates Also to comfort soon. Also, buying new pants in a dream. It is evidence of great changes and justice in the dreamer’s cause, and it also indicates the blessing of money. This vision may also reflect the high morals for which he was famous in his family. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream of courtship In a dream and its repercussions. Interpretation of a dream about trousers for a married woman. Dreams may sometimes be similar between individuals, but they differ in their connotations, meanings, and symbols, which is interpreted by many scholars and dream interpretation experts. In this context, we will learn more about the interpretation of a dream about trousers for a married woman. It is explained in the following lines: In the event that a married woman sees in In a dream, she is buying pants. This dream is considered a good sign because it foretells that this woman will obtain good wealth and abundant sustenance, God willing. In addition to that, seeing white pants in a dream. It is a sign of the coming of happiness and joy, and God Almighty is the Most High, All-Knowing. Whereas if a woman sees In a dream, she buys tight or short pants. This dream is one of the unpleasant dreams and visions. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing seeds in a dream from the most famous scholars. Complete interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about pants for single women. There are many dreams that people see in a dream, which are often what we see. In real life. The interpretation of a dream about pants for single women is as follows: Just in case you are seen with your pants on. This means that you need insurance. But in the event that you see that you are wearing your pants, it means that we will have enough security soon. This will bring good luck in a solution Problems. In addition, seeing new pants in a dream for one girl. It is evidence of the desire to appear before others in a new way. If you dream that you are wearing pants

title: Interpretation of a dream about an ostrich

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an ostrich in a dream. Many people wonder about the meaning of seeing an ostrich in a dream. You may also be interested in meeting a child in a dream. This is because the ostrich is one of the animals that is famous for its fear and cowardice in the animal world. In this context, we will present to you in this article the interpretation of seeing an ostrich in a dream. So follow us.Interpretation of seeing an ostrich in a dreamInterpretation of seeing an ostrich in a dream Scientists, dream interpreters, differed in the interpretation of seeing an ostrich in a dream. In general, the ostrich in a dream is linked to blessings or sustenance. Where Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing an ostrich in a dream, as it has a great blessing, or In which the dreamer lives. An ostrich in a dream can also represent a beautiful woman with a strong personality and a balanced mind. While Al-Nabulsi interpreted the ostrich in the dream as a person carrying in his hands the blessings that God Almighty has given him. This is an indication that the person is well aware that he is immersed in Blessings of God - the Almighty and Sublime - and that he feels grateful and good at appreciating these blessings. Al-Nabulsi says: This matter can be explained in another way, which is that a person holds his sins and transgressions in his hands, and wants to get rid of them. Thus, he realizes that he has committed many sins, and wants to He repents to God Almighty and gets rid of his sins and mistakes. While Ibn Shaheen linked seeing an ostrich in a dream to Bedouins and Bedouins. Where he explained the matter, the dreamer will have a working relationship, or a mixed one, with one of the Bedouins. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an ostrich slaughtered in a dream. A dream about slaughtering an ostrich in a dream indicates that the dreamer will marry a strong and beautiful woman. While slaughtering ostrich chicks is considered one of the hated things in the world of dream interpretation. The dreamer who eats ostrich meat in a dream indicates a lot of money, and a great blessing awaits him. It also indicates that the dreamer enjoys some Luxury in his life. Eating raw ostrich meat indicates slander and gossip about people’s honor. As for a dead ostrich in a dream, it portends the death of a woman in the real world. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an ostrich attack in a dream. Seeing an ostrich attack in a dream is an indication It is clear that the dreamer is hasty in making life decisions. This dream is a warning message to him, that he must be a little slow in the decisions he makes, which are sometimes fatal decisions. Regardless of some interpreting this attack as envy or hostility towards a fierce enemy, It lurks thanks to the dreamer. Some also believe that a strong ostrich attack indicates the hostility of a strong and ignorant woman. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about escaping from an ostrich. Escaping from an ostrich in a dream indicates that the dreamer is losing many valuable opportunities for him. Moreover, it He does not appreciate the blessings that God has bestowed on him in his life. Some interpreted it as a woman chasing the monarch who ignores her and tries to escape from her. And whoever sees in his dream that he is chasing an ostrich and catches it, this indicates that he will strive to do what will bring him benefit and abundant living - God willing. See also: holding a friend's hand in

title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing a calm sea in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Seeing a calm sea in a married woman’s dream: Seeing a calm sea in a dream has many connotations and meanings that can indicate goodness and can convey bad and sad news to its owner, and its interpretations depend on the details of the vision and the state of the fortuneteller, and we will explain everything. Points related to the calmness of observing the sea in the following article. Seeing the calm sea in a married woman’s dream. The dream of the calm sea in a dream shows many connotations and meanings, which are: If a married woman sees in her dream the calm sea in front of her house, this is a clear indication that she will enjoy prosperity and many Of gifts and abundant livelihood in the very near future. If the dreamer is married and has children who are studying and sees the calm sea in her dream, this is a sign of the great future that awaits her children from an academic standpoint. If a woman who has not given birth dreams of a calm and clear sea, God bless her to become pregnant in The coming period. If the dreamer sees the calm sea polluted or cloudy in the vision, this is a sign that she will fall into problems and crises that will prevent her from feeling happy. Seeing the calm sea in the dream of Ibn Sirin’s married wife. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained more than one indication of the dream of a calm sea in the dream of a married woman. They are as follows: If a married woman sees a calm sea in her dream and its waves suddenly rise and then return to a state of calm, this is a sign that she is suffering from diseases and must be examined so that the problem and her health do not worsen. Weakness. If the wife sees in her dream that she is moving away from the calm sea, then difficult times will come to her, dominated by sorrows and successive difficult crises that she cannot solve and get rid of, which will lead to her deterioration. A psychological state. If in reality a woman suffers from difficulties and bad material conditions and sees the calm sea in her dream, then she will be accepted into a new job from which she will earn a lot of money and her living conditions will improve. Seeing the calm sea in the dream of a married woman in Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi, one of the most famous scholars of interpretation, explained many Among the interpretations of a dream of a calm sea for a married woman, the most prominent are: If a married woman sees a clear and calm sea in her dream, this is clear evidence that she has power and influence in reality. Seeing a clear and calm sea in a wife’s dream symbolizes the achievement of all the goals that she tried to achieve in the near future. If a woman sees in her dream that she is drinking water from a calm, clean sea, this indicates that she has beautiful qualities and high morals. Seeing a calm sea in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a calm sea in a pregnant woman’s dream has many meanings, the most famous of which are: If the dreamer is pregnant and sees the calm sea in In her dream, this is clear evidence that God will give her the gender of the child she wants. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is bathing in a calm and clear sea, this is a clear indication that she will open a new page with her Creator and stop doing what makes her angry. To see a calm sea with clear water in a dream For a pregnant woman, this is a promising matter and symbolizes that the birth process will pass safely without interruption

title: Interpretation of a dream about a small child being bitten

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams biting a small child in different situations, today we will talk about biting in a dream in general. Some translators, such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi, and others, interpreted the dream of being bitten in a dream, and we collected these interpretations and brought them to you so that you can learn the interpretation. The dream, all you have to do is follow us in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about being bitten by Ibn Sirin in a dream: Ibn Sirin said in a dream about being bitten in a dream that it could represent “hatred or spite,” and he also interpreted it in some dreams as intense and excessive love. To bite and to see. It may be tainted with sin, and whoever sees in a dream that some of his fingers are standing still, this indicates his anxiety or remorse for what he left behind in his religion, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about being bitten by Nabulsi in a dream: Al-Nabulsi told us that being bitten in a dream is only evidence of... Some internal feelings such as hatred and hatred, or evidence of intense love and great love for him, or a sign of imminent trial. Interpretation of dreams biting a small child: And whoever sees in a dream that he bites fingers, that is, fingers, this indicates hatred, and he cited verses from the Qur’an in explaining That. He also interpreted the vision of biting fingers in a dream as indicating extreme sadness, as mentioned in the Holy Qur’an. But if the bite was strong and blood came from it, then this is evidence that he has committed a sin or is being tried, just as the bite is evidence of excessive anger. And when a person sees... In a dream that someone has bitten him, this is evidence that joy and pleasure are approaching him and that he will be happy. Interpretation of a dream about being bitten by Ibn Shaheen in a dream: Ibn Shaheen explained to us the dream of being bitten in a dream as evidence of the power of excessive love. Whoever sees in a dream that someone has bitten If he bites him, this is evidence that he is in pain and suffering from it. And if he sees that an unknown person bites him in a dream, this is evidence that he will be harmed by his enemy. And whoever sees that a person has bitten him and is bleeding from him, this indicates that this person loves him, but the sin is being committed on his part, and God Almighty The Most High and Most Knowing. Whoever bites his fingers in a dream shows the extent of sadness and anxiety that befalls him regarding his religion, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. To interpret a different dream, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.
